name: Dynamic Code Loading
description: This app contains code that dynamically loads classes from `.jar` and `.apk` files containing a `classes.dex` entry. This can be used to execute code not installed as part of an application. This behavior is a security hazard since malicious code could be loaded and executed in the context of the app.
remediation: We strongly suggest you to remove dynamic code loads unless necessary. If this is the case, we suggest to carefully revise all the code loaded and executed.

references.text: Further information on dynamic loading can be found in the official documentation [[1]].
